resources.string: The main focus of this Express Purchase application is to limit searching problem of a customer. Customers tend to search for a particular product and end up getting so much of redundant products as well. So this application will solve this problem by limiting products, just by showing limited products which will be according to customer’s preferences i.e. their age and gender. Further it will limit products as per the category of product selected by the user. Still if the problem persists then there is also a search option which will show the customer their desired product. For people who are not comfortable with typing, there is also an option as voice search which will let the user to search a product as per their voice command. We also have a feature of day/night mode which let the user to switch between 2 types of themes. This feature has been made to let the user to use app in the dark\n\nspace as well which will not harm their eyes with so much of bright colors in the dark.So, if you’re looking for something new, you’re in the right place. This application strive to be innovative, offering customers something they want, putting their desires at the top of priority list.
